name: Waterfall + Geyser + Floodgate
author: support@geysermc.org
description:
Waterfall is a fork of the well-known BungeeCord server teleportation suite.

This customization installs the GeyserMC and Floodgate plugins, which allows Bedrock players to connect without needing a Java account.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Waterfall+GeyserMC+Floodgate Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=waterfall
if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r --arg VERSION $MINECRAFT_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep -m1 true`
LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
echo -e "Version is valid. Using version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
else
echo -e "Using the latest ${PROJECT} version"
MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
fi
BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds[] | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep -m1 true`
LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
echo -e "Build is valid for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}. Using build ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
else
echo -e "Using the latest ${PROJECT} build for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
fi
JAR_NAME=${PROJECT}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar
echo "Version being downloaded"
echo -e "MC Version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
echo -e "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
echo -e "JAR Name of Build: ${JAR_NAME}"
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}
fi
cd /mnt/server
echo -e "Running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}
if [ ! -f config.yml ]; then
echo -e "Downloading config.yml"
curl -o config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/proxy/java/waterfall/config.yml
fi
mkdir plugins
echo -e "Downloading Geyser"
GEYSER_HASH=`curl -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest | jq -r .downloads.bungeecord.sha256`
curl -o plugins/geyser-bungeecord.jar -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/bungeecord
echo "${GEYSER_HASH} plugins/geyser-bungeecord.jar" | sha256sum -c
RESULT=$?
if [[ $RESULT -eq 0 ]]; then
echo "Geyser SHA256 match"
else
echo "SHA256 does not match! Aborting..."
rm plugins/geyser-bungeecord.jar
exit 1
fi
echo -e "Downloading Floodgate"
FLOODGATE_HASH=`curl -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest | jq -r .downloads.bungee.sha256`
curl -o plugins/floodgate-bungee.jar -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/bungee
echo "${FLOODGATE_HASH} plugins/floodgate-bungee.jar" | sha256sum -c
RESULT=$?
if [[ $RESULT -eq 0 ]]; then
echo "Floodgate SHA256 match"
else
echo "SHA256 does not match! Aborting..."
rm plugins/floodgate-bungee.jar
exit 1
fi
mkdir -p plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/
if [[ ! -f "plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/config.yml" ]]; then
echo -e "Downloading default Geyser config"
curl -o plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/master/core/src/main/resources/config.yml
sed -i 's/: online/: floodgate/g' plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/config.yml
fi

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of Minecraft that water was built to support.

variables.name: Waterfall Jar File
variables.description:
Server Jarfile, by default this is set to 'waterfall.jar'.
Set it to otherwise if you wish to have a different jarfile name.

variables.name: Download Link
variables.description: A link to the server jar to download the waterfall jar.

variables.name: Waterfall build number
variables.description:
Default is latest.

if set to latest or an invalid version will grab the latest build number.

variables.name: Geyser Port
variables.description:
The UDP port that Geyser will listen on

"-1" will forcibly stop Geyser
"server" will have Geyser listen on the same port as the TCP server
